ygData.subject: What happens on internet connection failure?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi What happens for H3 on internet connection failure? I mean if internet get disconnected; do H3 pauses until next connection or it simply marks URL as failed

Hi  
What happens for H3 on internet connection failure?

I mean if interne=
t get disconnected; do H3 pauses until next connection or it simply marks U=
RL as failed and goes to next one (and mark it too to the end)?
 
If it mar=
ks URLs as failed one after the other; does it re-tries to fetch them on ne=
xt connection or those URLs will never fetched? 

Thanks
